info.description: These APIs are based on the SCIM 2.0 Protocol (RFC7644). Please note that some resource names contain spaces and that may break some Swagger validators.
info.title: API Explorer

get.summary: Search for one or more resources

Resources.description: A multi-valued list of complex objects containing the requested resources.

itemsPerPage.description: The number of resources returned in a list response page.

schemas.description: Contains a list of one or more URIs that indicate included SCIM schemas that are used to indicate the attributes contained within a resource.

startIndex.description: The 1-based index of the first result in the current set of list results.

totalResults.description: The total number of results returned by the list or query operation.

default.description: An error occurred while executing the operation

post.summary: Search for one or more resources using HTTP POST
post.description: Useful for executing searches without passing parameters that may contain sensitive information on the URL.

Resources.description: A multi-valued list of complex objects containing the requested resources.

itemsPerPage.description: The number of resources returned in a list response page.

schemas.description: Contains a list of one or more URIs that indicate included SCIM schemas that are used to indicate the attributes contained within a resource.

startIndex.description: The 1-based index of the first result in the current set of list results.

totalResults.description: The total number of results returned by the list or query operation.

default.description: An error occurred while executing the operation

200.description: The retrieved resource is included in the response body

scopes.TPPReadAll: Read access on OBThirdPartyproviders for match on Organisation Id

schemas.description: Contains a list of one or more URIs that indicate included SCIM schemas that are used to indicate the attributes contained within a resource.

status.description: The HTTP status code (see Section 6 [RFC7231]) expressed as a JSON String.

externalDocs.description: HTTP Status and Error Response Handling

schemas.description: Contains a list of one or more URIs that indicate included SCIM schemas that are used to indicate the attributes contained within a resource.

items.description: A multi-valued list of strings indicating the names of resource attributes to return in the response, overriding the set of attributes that would be returned by default."excludedAttributes" must not also be specified if this is specified.
A multi-valued list of strings indicating the names of resource attributes to be removed from the default set of attributes to return. "attributes" must not also be specified if this is specified.

filter.description: The filter string used to request a subset of resources.

sortBy.description: A string indicating the attribute whose value shall be used to order the returned responses.

sortOrder.description: A string indicating the order in which the "sortBy" parameter is applied.

startIndex.description: An integer indicating the 1-based index of the first query result.

count.description: An integer indicating the desired maximum number of query results per page.

created.description: Date and time the resource was created
created.title: created

lastModified.description: Date and time the resource was last modified
lastModified.title: lastModified

urn:openbanking:competentauthorityclaims.description: Claims sourced from a competent authority(e.g. FCA) - can be applied to either TPPs to ASPSP
urn:openbanking:competentauthorityclaims.title: CompetentAuthorityClaims

Active.description: Indicator to show if this claim is active
Active.title: Active

Psd2Role.description: Psd2 Role in which institution authorised
Psd2Role.title: Psd2Role

AuthorityId.description: The ID of the accrediting authority.
AuthorityId.title: AuthorityId

EtsiIdentifier.description: European Telecommunications Standards Institute Organisation Identifier
EtsiIdentifier.title: EtsiIdentifier

RegistrationId.description: Registration Id with the principle authority
RegistrationId.title: RegistrationId

urn:openbanking:legalauthorityclaims:1.0.description: Claims sourced from a legal authority(e.g. Companies House) - can be applied to either TPPs to ASPSP
urn:openbanking:legalauthorityclaims:1.0.title: LegalAuthotiryClaims

LegalAuthorityClaims.description: Details of each Company Registration Authority with which the Company is registered
LegalAuthorityClaims.title: LegalAuthorityClaims

urn:openbanking:organisation:1.0.description: Account details for an open banking organisation which are used for SCIM access to the Directory on behalf of an accredited organisation.
urn:openbanking:organisation:1.0.title: Organisation

EmailAddresses.description: Email addresses associated with the organisation
EmailAddresses.title: EmailAddresses

Name.description: A name of a person or an office to which this email belongs.
Name.title: Name

Primary.description: Indicator to show is this is the primary email address
Primary.title: Primary

OrganisationCommonName.description: The common name of the organisation
OrganisationCommonName.title: OrganisationCommonName

PersonalAccountRoles.description: Individuals who have authorised access to the organisation
PersonalAccountRoles.title: PersonalAccountRoles

UserName.description: User's name, email address or other identifying label
UserName.title: UserName

PhoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers by which an organisation can be contacted
PhoneNumbers.title: PhoneNumbers

Name.description: A name of a person or an office to which this phone number belongs.
Name.title: Name

Value.description: Value of phone number through which the organisation can be contacted
Value.title: Value

Verified.description: Flag to show that the phone number has been verified
Verified.title: Verified

Primary.description: Flag to indicate that this is the primary contact address
Primary.title: Primary

urn:openbanking:softwarestatement:1.0.description: Software Statement Schema as defined by Open Banking
urn:openbanking:softwarestatement:1.0.title: SoftwareStatement

Active.description: Flag to show if software statement is active
Active.title: Active

ClientId.description: Requested Client Id - note that OB will issue a set of credentials with this clientid for this given piece of software. ASPSPs are not obliged to honour this requested clientid
ClientId.title: ClientId

ClientName.description: Human readable client name. May be localised.
ClientName.title: ClientName

ClientUri.description:
The home page or other wise recognisable url of the application (oath client)
Version 22, 14th November 2017. V39 Changed to required
ClientUri.title: ClientUri

Description.description:
Description of the unique instance of this piece of software. If only one instance of a piece of software is to be registered then this should be the same as the SoftwareDescription 
V39 Changed to required
Description.title: Description

LogoUri.description:
The software logo
Version 22, 14th November 2017. V39 Changed to required
LogoUri.title: LogoUri

Mode.description: A flag to identify if a piece of software should have access to production PSU accounts. This field has been added at the request of an ASPSP to allow BETA or Non Production testing against production platforms. The default for this system should be "Live"
Mode.title: Mode

ObClientCreated.description: An indicator to show if the client has been created in Open Banking
ObClientCreated.title: ObClientCreated

OnBehalfOfObOrganisation.description:
The organisation on whom this software statement is behalf of
Altered from reference to string, 10/11/2017
OnBehalfOfObOrganisation.title: OnBehalfOfObOrganisation

PolicyUri.description:
An optional document containing a link to a Policy document governing the privacy information policy of for the application. Purely to be displayed a PSU at a ASPSP if the ASPSP supports it. Optional for the TPP to provide.
V39 Changed to required
PolicyUri.title: PolicyUri

RedirectUri.description: Redirect Uri's for the registered piece of software. May be overridden by the RFC7591 payload. Changed in v27. V39 Changed to required
RedirectUri.title: RedirectUri

Roles.description: Roles for which this software statement can be used. Changed to required Mike Ekers request
Roles.title: Roles

SigningKeyIds.description: KeyIds of Keys  used for signing messages
SigningKeyIds.title: SigningKeyIds

TermsOfServiceUri.description:
An optional document containing a link to a Terms of Service document governing the terms of service for the application. Purely to be displayed a PSU at a ASPSP if the ASPSP supports it. Optional for the TPP to provide.
V39 Changed to required
TermsOfServiceUri.title: TermsOfServiceUri

TransportKeyIds.description: KeyIds of Keys used for securing message transport (TLS)
TransportKeyIds.title: TransportKeyIds

Version.description: Version of the sofware. V39 Changed to required
Version.title: Version

OBThirdPartyProviders.description: Third party providers consisting of payment initiation service providers and account information service providers

created.description: Date and time the resource was created
created.title: created

lastModified.description: Date and time the resource was last modified
lastModified.title: lastModified

AuthorityId.description: Unique string that the Authority is commonly known by. Will be referenced by the AuthorityClaims Set.
AuthorityId.title: AuthorityId

Country.description: Country in which the Authority has juristiction
Country.title: Country

created.description: Date and time the resource was created
created.title: created

lastModified.description: Date and time the resource was last modified
lastModified.title: lastModified

OBAuthorities.description: A schema defining the extension attributes that a competent authority has.

BaseApiDNSUri.description:
Points to the Open Banking APIs
V39 required
BaseApiDNSUri.title: BaseApiDNSUri

ClientRegistrationUri.description:
The registration endpoint for TPP onboarding to ASPSPs.
V39 required
ClientRegistrationUri.title: ClientRegistrationUri

CustomerFriendlyLogoUri.description:
uri from which a TPP can retrieve a certified logo
V39 required
CustomerFriendlyLogoUri.title: CustomerFriendlyLogoUri

DeveloperPortalUri.description:
URI for TPP developer testing
V39 required
DeveloperPortalUri.title: DeveloperPortalUri

EISCDId.description:
Confirmation of payee bank identifier
V37 was CoPBankIdentifier
EISCDId.title: EISCDId

OpenIDConfigEndPointUri.description:
Uri used for Oauth2.0 OpenId Configuration
V39 required
OpenIDConfigEndPointUri.title: OpenIDConfigEndPointUri

ParentAuthorisationServerId.description: Authorisation Server Id of Parent Authorisation server, used for app to app linking
ParentAuthorisationServerId.title: ParentAuthorisationServerId

PayloadSigningCertLocation.description:
The location which is used for signing certificates
V39 required
PayloadSigningCertLocation.title: PayloadSigningCertLocation

TermsOfService.description:
Uri from which the terms of service can be retrieved
V39 required
TermsOfService.title: TermsOfService

filter.name: filter
filter.description: The filter string used to request a subset of resources.

startIndex.name: startIndex
startIndex.description: An integer indicating the 1-based index of the first query result.

sortOrder.name: sortOrder
sortOrder.description: A string indicating the order in which the "sortBy" parameter is applied.

count.name: count
count.description: An integer indicating the desired maximum number of query results per page.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.description: A comma separated list of strings indicating the names of resource attributes to return in the response, overriding the set of attributes that would be returned by default. "excludedAttributes" must not also be specified if this is specified.

sortBy.name: sortBy
sortBy.description: A string indicating the attribute whose value shall be used to order the returned responses.

id.name: id
id.description: The resource identifier (value of the "id" attribute).

excludedAttributes.name: excludedAttributes
excludedAttributes.description: A comma separated list of strings indicating the names of resource attributes to be removed from the default set of attributes to return. "attributes" must not also be specified if this is specified.
